issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: HDFS 2.7+ DataNodeDescriptor constructor calls updateHeartBeat which updates only a couple fields since all the arguments for the call are null or 0.
fields.summary: Modify DataNodeDescriptor() to not call UpdateHeartBeatState

comments.body:
This moves the only possible operations that come from updateHeartbeatState to the constructor since most of the code in the method is not called as the values are empty arrays, zero or null. 

This patch will delay the call to {{rollBlocksScheduled}} or effectively the value set to now() for lastBlocksScheduledRollTime member till the next heartbeat. 

Since the call to updateHeartbeatState is in the constructor, traditional mockito methods to verify the call have been unsuccessful. Appreciate any ideas from the community on the patch and a possible test as well. Thanks!
